Package org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.enumeration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlanEnumerationPruningStrategy
    A strategy to prune PlanImplementations from a PlanEnumeration.
    StageAssignmentTraversal.StageSplittingCriterion
    Criterion to futher split InterimStage besides precedence.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExecutionTaskFlow
    Graph of ExecutionTasks and Channels.
    ExecutionTaskFlowCompiler
    Creates an ExecutionTaskFlow from a PlanImplementation.
    ExecutionTaskFlowCompiler.Activation
    Propagates a Channel to its consumers.
    LatentOperatorPruningStrategy
    This PlanEnumerationPruningStrategy follows the idea that we can prune a PlanImplementation, when there is a further one that is (i) better and (ii) has the exact same operators with still-to-be-connected Slots.
    LoopEnumerator
    Enumerator for LoopSubplans.
    LoopImplementation
    Describes the enumeration of a LoopSubplan.
    PlanEnumeration
    Represents a collection of PlanImplementations that all implement the same section of a RheemPlan (which is assumed to contain OperatorAlternatives in general).
    PlanEnumerator
    The plan partitioner recursively dissects a RheemPlan into PlanEnumerations and then assembles them.
    PlanEnumerator.EnumerationActivator
    An Operator can be activated as soon as all of its inputs are available.
    PlanImplementation
    Represents a partial execution plan.
    RandomPruningStrategy
    This PlanEnumerationPruningStrategy retains only the best k PlanImplementations.
    SinglePlatformPruningStrategy
    This PlanEnumerationPruningStrategy retains only the best PlanImplementations employing a single Platform only.
    StageAssignmentTraversal
    Builds an ExecutionPlan from a ExecutionTaskFlow.
    TopKPruningStrategy
    This PlanEnumerationPruningStrategy retains only the best k PlanImplementations.
